controllers

Class ProductBatchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.ProductBatchController

  • public class ProductBatchController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller class for "Produkt Batches", it takes input from the API class, validates input and passes the data to the corresponding DAO class, when the DAO class saved/deleted/updated the data, the controller class returns a Response to the corresponding API.
